title: Melody  Beats ( Trap + Melody Mix )
description: Trap and Melody mixed Beats ( Emotional, Happy, Fantasy) with a soundtrack version for each
longDescription:
Audio Preview


note :- All the music tracks I have composed are created from scratch. My artist name is Meraj Melody. You can visit my YouTube channel to see how I create music from scratch. If you need verification of my music, I can also provide video screenshots of my projects demonstrating how I composed these tracks. As a musician dedicated to producing original music, I ensure that I do not use any third-party samples or AI tools in my compositions. This is to preserve the originality of my work and avoid potential legal issues in the future.

I am a music composer and sound designer, and I work with a team in a small audio studio in our local market. I can guarantee you that we don't use any AI in our projects because it would destroy the originality. You can check out the preview on YouTube to see how I create music and sound effects from scratch.


https://youtu.be/PrynlgTWsdQ




Souls and trap mixed beat, You will find 15 trap and souls mixed beats and 14 tracks' soundtrack versions of the main beats.

The "Trap and Souls Mixed Beats (Emotional, Happy, Fantasy)" music beat package is a collection of truly unique and versatile tracks that combine the hard-hitting rhythms and edgy vibe of trap music with the dynamic and soulful elements of R&B and soul.

﻿By Purchasing the package you have the rights to use any commercial project to use in (games, software, videos, animation, etc)
You have the rights to the modified track (pitch down, pitch up, sampling)


you will not get a copyright claim for using this music on YouTube.
